faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password: 1) Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, 2) Enter your email address, 3) Check your email for a reset link, 4) Click the link and create a new password. The link expires in 24 hours.

faqs.question: The application is running slowly. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Try these steps: 1) Clear your browser cache and cookies, 2) Close unnecessary browser tabs, 3) Restart your browser, 4) Check your internet connection speed, 5) Try using a different browser. If the issue persists, please contact technical support.

faqs.question: I can't upload files. What's wrong?
faqs.answer: Common file upload issues: 1) Check file size (max 50MB), 2) Ensure file format is supported (PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG), 3) Check your internet connection, 4) Try a different browser, 5) Disable browser extensions temporarily. If none of these work, contact support.

faqs.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
faqs.answer: To enable 2FA: 1) Go to Settings > Security, 2) Click 'Enable Two-Factor Authentication', 3) Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.), 4) Enter the 6-digit code to verify, 5) Save your backup codes in a safe place.

faqs.question: How do I update my payment method?
faqs.answer: To update payment information: 1) Log in to your account, 2) Go to Settings > Billing, 3) Click 'Payment Methods', 4) Click 'Add Payment Method' or edit existing one, 5) Enter new card details, 6) Click 'Save'. Your next billing will use the updated payment method.

faqs.question: When will I be charged for my subscription?
faqs.answer: Subscription billing: Monthly plans are charged on the same day each month that you subscribed. Annual plans are charged once per year on your anniversary date. You'll receive an email receipt after each charge. View your next billing date in Settings > Billing.

faqs.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: To cancel your subscription: 1) Go to Settings > Billing, 2) Click 'Manage Subscription', 3) Click 'Cancel Subscription', 4) Select a reason (optional), 5) Confirm cancellation. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.

faqs.question: Where can I download my invoices?
faqs.answer: To access invoices: 1) Log in to your account, 2) Go to Settings > Billing, 3) Click 'Invoice History', 4) Click the download icon next to any invoice. Invoices are available in PDF format. You can also set up automatic invoice emails in billing settings.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept: Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), Debit cards, PayPal, and ACH bank transfers (for annual plans only). All payments are processed securely through our payment processor.

faqs.question: How do I change my email address?
faqs.answer: To change your email: 1) Go to Settings > Account, 2) Click 'Edit' next to your email, 3) Enter new email address, 4) Click 'Send Verification', 5) Check your new email and click the verification link. Your email will be updated once verified.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: To delete your account: 1) Go to Settings > Account, 2) Scroll to 'Delete Account', 3) Click 'Delete My Account', 4) Enter your password to confirm, 5) Click 'Permanently Delete'. Warning: This action is irreversible and all your data will be deleted within 30 days.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take security seriously: 1) All data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256), 2) We perform regular security audits, 3) We're SOC 2 Type II certified, 4) We never share your data with third parties without consent, 5) Two-factor authentication is available for all accounts.

faqs.question: What are your business hours for support?
faqs.answer: Our support team is available: Monday-Friday 9am-6pm EST, Saturday 10am-4pm EST. We're closed on Sundays and major holidays. For urgent issues outside business hours, enterprise customers can use our 24/7 emergency support line.

faqs.question: How do I upgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: To upgrade your plan: 1) Go to Settings > Billing, 2) Click 'Change Plan', 3) Select your new plan, 4) Review the prorated charge, 5) Click 'Upgrade Now'. You'll be charged the prorated difference immediately and your new features will be available instantly.

faqs.question: I'm getting an error message. What should I do?
faqs.answer: When you encounter an error: 1) Take a screenshot of the error message, 2) Note what you were doing when it occurred, 3) Try refreshing the page, 4) Clear your browser cache, 5) Try again. If the error persists, contact support with the screenshot and details.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Refund policy: Monthly subscriptions can be refunded within 14 days of charge if no usage occurred. Annual subscriptions can be refunded within 30 days with a prorated calculation. To request a refund, contact our billing team with your account email and reason for refund.

faqs.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial of our Pro plan. No credit card required to start. To begin your trial: 1) Sign up for a new account, 2) Select 'Start Free Trial', 3) Explore all Pro features. You can upgrade or downgrade anytime during or after the trial.

faqs.question: Which browsers do you support?
faqs.answer: Supported browsers: Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome or Firefox. Internet Explorer is not supported.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via: 1) Email: support@example.com (response within 24 hours), 2) Live chat: Available during business hours, 3) Phone: Enterprise customers only, 4) Help Center: help.example.com for self-service articles.

faqs.question: Can I use the service on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our service is fully responsive and works on mobile devices. We also offer native mobile apps: 1) iOS app (requires iOS 13+) available on App Store, 2) Android app (requires Android 8+) available on Google Play. Download the app for the best mobile experience.
